docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Querying DNS data Catch the Records root@sdi08b:~# dig www.natan-cafeandbar.com CNAME +short natan-cafeandbar.com. root@sdi08b:~# dig www.natan-cafeandbar.com A +short natan-cafeandbar.com. 81.169.145.70 root@sdi08b:~# dig www.natan-cafeandbar.com MX +short natan-cafeandbar.com. 100 alt3.aspmx.l.google.com. 200 alt2.aspmx.l.google.com. 20 alt1.aspmx.l.google.com. 10 aspmx.l.google.com. root@sdi08b:~# dig www.natan-cafeandbar.com NS +short natan-cafeandbar.com. shades20.rzone.de. docks02.rzone.de. root@sdi08b:~# dig -x 81.169.145.70 +short w06.rzone.de.
docs.title: Querying DNS data

docs.text: root@sdi08b:~# dig www.natan-cafeandbar.com CNAME +short natan-cafeandbar.com. root@sdi08b:~# dig www.natan-cafeandbar.com A +short natan-cafeandbar.com. 81.169.145.70 root@sdi08b:~# dig www.natan-cafeandbar.com MX +short natan-cafeandbar.com. 100 alt3.aspmx.l.google.com. 200 alt2.aspmx.l.google.com. 20 alt1.aspmx.l.google.com. 10 aspmx.l.google.com. root@sdi08b:~# dig www.natan-cafeandbar.com NS +short natan-cafeandbar.com. shades20.rzone.de. docks02.rzone.de. root@sdi08b:~# dig -x 81.169.145.70 +short w06.rzone.de.
docs.title: Catch the Records
